briefdescription.para: pointer to the stream that can be used to write to the pipe
functions and data are displayed in a defined styles
interpolate and approximate data in defined styles (e.g. spline)
number of all tmpfiles (number of tmpfiles restricted)

detaileddescription.para: A C++ interface to gnuplot.
The interface uses pipes and so won't run on a system that doesn't have POSIX pipe support Tested on Windows (MinGW and Visual C++) and Linux (GCC)

Version history: 0. C interface by N. Devillard (27/01/03)
C++ interface: direct translation from the C interface by Rajarshi Guha (07/03/03)
corrections for Win32 compatibility by V. Chyzhdzenka (20/05/03)
some member functions added, corrections for Win32 and Linux compatibility by M. Burgis (10/03/08)
Move function definition into gnuplot_i.cpp by X. BROQUERE (25/10/11)

briefdescription.para: creates tmpfile and returns its name

simplesect.para: < found the gnuplot path (yes == true, no == false)

briefdescription.para: optional function: set Gnuplot path manual attention: for windows: path with slash '/' not backslash '\'

detaileddescription.para: optional: set standart terminal, used by showonscreen defaults: Windows - win, Linux - x11, Mac - aqua

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< double > &x, const std::string &title="", const std::string &style="points", const std::string &labelx="x", const std::string &labely="y")
memberdef.name: Gnuplot

briefdescription.para: plot a single std::vector at one go

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< double > &x, const std::vector< double > &y, const std::string &title="", const std::string &style="points", const std::string &labelx="x", const std::string &labely="y")
memberdef.name: Gnuplot

briefdescription.para: plot pairs std::vector at one go

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< double > &x, const std::vector< double > &y, const std::vector< double > &z, const std::string &title="", const std::string &style="points", const std::string &labelx="x", const std::string &labely="y", const std::string &labelz="z")
memberdef.name: Gnuplot

briefdescription.para: plot triples std::vector at one go
destructor: needed to delete temporary files
Sends a command to an active gnuplot session, identical to cmd() send a command to gnuplot using the << operator.

simplesect.para: < a reference to the gnuplot object

briefdescription.para: saves a gnuplot session to a postscript file, filename without extension

detaileddescription.para: set line style (some of these styles require additional information): lines, points, linespoints, impulses, dots, steps, fsteps, histeps, boxes, histograms, filledcurves

interpolation and approximation of data, arguments: csplines, bezier, acsplines (for data values > 0), sbezier, unique, frequency (works only with plot_x, plot_xy, plotfile_x, plotfile_xy (if smooth is set, set_style has no effekt on data plotting)

briefdescription.para: unset smooth attention: smooth is not set by default

simplesect.para: < a reference to a gnuplot object

briefdescription.para: scales the size of the points used in plots
grid is not set by default

detaileddescription.para: set the mulitplot mode
unsets the mulitplot mode

briefdescription.para: set sampling rate of functions, or for interpolating data
set isoline density (grid) for plotting functions as surfaces (for 3d plots)

detaileddescription.para: enables/disables hidden line removal for surface plotting (for 3d plot)
hidden3d is not set by default
enables/disables contour drawing for surfaces (for 3d plot) base, surface, both
contour is not set by default, it disables contour drawing for surfaces
enables/disables the display of surfaces (for 3d plot)
surface is set by default, it disables the display of surfaces (for 3d plot)
switches legend on/off position: inside/outside, left/center/right, top/center/bottom, nobox/box

briefdescription.para: Switches legend off attention:legend is set by default.
sets and clears the title of a gnuplot session

parameterdescription.para: --> the title of the plot [optional, default == ""]

briefdescription.para: Clears the title of a gnuplot session The title is not set by default.

detaileddescription.para: autoscale axis (set by default) of xaxis
autoscale axis (set by default) of yaxis
autoscale axis (set by default) of zaxis

briefdescription.para: turns on/off log scaling for the specified xaxis (logscale is not set by default)
turns on/off log scaling for the specified yaxis (logscale is not set by default)
turns on/off log scaling for the specified zaxis (logscale is not set by default)

detaileddescription.para: turns off log scaling for the x axis
turns off log scaling for the y axis
turns off log scaling for the z axis

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &filename, const unsigned int column=1, const std::string &title="")
memberdef.name: plotfile_x

detaileddescription.para: plot a single std::vector: x from file
Plots a 2d graph from a list of doubles: x.

Plots a 2d graph from a list of doubles: x y.

detaileddescription.para: plot x,y pairs with dy errorbars

memberdef.argsstring: (const double a, const double b, const std::string &title="")
memberdef.name: plot_slope

briefdescription.para: plot an equation of the form: y = ax + b, you supply a and b

detaileddescription.para: plot an equation supplied as a std::string y=f(x), write only the function f(x) not y= the independent variable has to be x binary operators: ** exponentiation, * multiply, / divide, + add, - substract, % modulo unary operators: - minus, ! factorial elementary functions: rand(x), abs(x), sgn(x), ceil(x), floor(x), int(x), imag(x), real(x), arg(x), sqrt(x), exp(x), log(x), log10(x), sin(x), cos(x), tan(x), asin(x), acos(x), atan(x), atan2(y,x), sinh(x), cosh(x), tanh(x), asinh(x), acosh(x), atanh(x) special functions: erf(x), erfc(x), inverf(x), gamma(x), igamma(a,x), lgamma(x), ibeta(p,q,x), besj0(x), besj1(x), besy0(x), besy1(x), lambertw(x) statistical fuctions: norm(x), invnorm(x)
plot an equation supplied as a std::string z=f(x,y), write only the function f(x,y) not z= the independent variables have to be x and y

memberdef.argsstring: (const unsigned char *ucPicBuf, const unsigned int iWidth, const unsigned int iHeight, const std::string &title="")
memberdef.name: plot_image

listitem.para: note that this function is not valid for versions of GNUPlot below 4.2

briefdescription.para: replot repeats the last plot or splot command. this can be useful for viewing a plot with different set options, or when generating the same plot for several devices (showonscreen, savetops)
resets a gnuplot session (next plot will erase previous ones)
resets a gnuplot session and sets all variables to default

simplesect.para: true if valid, false if not
